Message.Msg: parisonr, i have a 10 year old son and im honestly frightened to think what will be left of america for my son to prosper. i cant believe that current voters can be so naive to think that a national debt as high as it is, endless printing of money, such high unemployment, low gdp ect is sustainable, we no longer manufacture and big government regulations have us unable to compete on even a third world/ raw goods level..the libertarian party is our last hope, the is the first time i see myself rooting for the downfall of america, bush ruined it for the gop and obama is well on his way for ruining it for a dems, hopefully, when enough people are out of work and living on dwindling government aid, they will wake up and vote both parties out..both parties are responsible for the destruction of america, it didnt happen only on obamas watch.

Message.Title: BAC Stress Tests Due 3-7-13
Message.Msg: Last year BAC fell in the weeks before the stress test results (just like now) and when the results were announced BAC shot up 20%. In the last week BAC has fallen to a 11.5 PE ratio, which happens to be the industry average. Odds are heavily in favor of BAC being granted permission to pay an increased dividend, and or do a stock buy back. If they are, we could be in for another 20% boost.
